etymology:
Inherited from Ottoman Turkish كندر (kendir, “hemp”), from Proto-Turkic *kendir (“hemp”).
Cognates
Cognate with Bashkir киндер (kinder), Chuvash кантӑр (kant̬ăr), Karakalpak kendir, Kazakh кендір (kendır), Kyrgyz кендир (kendir), Tatar киндер (kinder), Turkmen kendir, Tuvan хендир (xendir) and Hungarian kender, an Oghur Turkic loanword.
